name: Flip n' Phase
description:
Flip n' Phase WARNING:

This game uses purchased music assets, if you are creating content using this game press 'N' to mute the sound track.

The game:
  • Flip n' Phase is a platforming game where you switch the color of your player to influence the obstacles that you collide with. 
  • The game consists of five levels of increasing difficulty (you can play the levels in any order but they are meant to be played from left to right). You will receive a time for each level and every level has a hidden collectible for you to find (you must complete the level without dying after collecting it). Try to  compete to get the fastest time! All of my best times will be posted below.
  • This game was created in three days for submission into Icoso's Geojam 2021.
Controls:
  • Press 'A' and 'D' to move left and right, respectively.
  • Press the space bar to jump.
  • Press 'W',  'S', or click either mouse button to switch colors.
  • Press 'R' to reset the level (if there are any issues with resetting, pause and click reset level).
  • Press escape to pause and unpause.
Sound controls:
  • Press 'O' and 'P' to lower and raise the volume, respectively.
  • Press 'M' to toggle muting ALL sounds.
  • Press 'N' to toggle muting ONLY the music.
The creator:
  • I am an 18-year-old American game maker and avid Icoso viewer!
My times:
  • "The Basics": 3s 901ms
  • "Intro to Spikes": 10s 903ms
  • "Bullet Time": 34s 660ms
  • "Painful Precision": 29s 680ms
  • "Speedrunner's Nightmare": 1min 6s 80ms
The assets:
  • The game was created in the Unity game engine with the following added packages:
    • Cinemachine
    • Text Mesh Pro Essentials
    • URP
  • All graphics were created in Unity to fit the geometric style
  • All sound effects were created using "ChipTone"
